description: Main source file for a Flutter application, setting up the app's entry point, main widget, and home page with a simple loading message.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, setting up the MaterialApp with theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the home screen with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the UI for MyHomePage, displaying a loading message.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, calls runApp with MyApp.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp, returning MaterialApp setup.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for MyHomePage.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for _MyHomePageState, constructing the UI.
